entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
